## npm commands


| Befehl      | Wirkung |
| ----------- | ----------- |
| **npm install -g npm-check**      | zuerst den npm-check installieren |
| **npm audit fix --force**         | integrierter updater |
| **npm-check**                     | check depencies for latest version |
| **npm-check -u**                  | interactive updater |
| **npm -v**                        | get npm version |
